{{ aviso }}
{{ resposta }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ChatGptService } from './chat-gpt.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-chat-gpt', templateUrl: './chat-gpt.component.html', styleUrls: ['./chat-gpt.component.css'] }) export class ChatGptComponent implements OnInit { prompt = ''; resposta = ''; selectedAI = 'gemini'; availableAIs = ['gpt', 'deepseek', 'gemini']; loading = false; aviso = ''; constructor(private chat: ChatGptService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} enviarPrompt(): void { if (!this.prompt.trim() || !this.selectedAI) { this.aviso = 'Informe prompt e escolha a IA.'; return; } this.loading = true; this.aviso = ''; this.resposta = ''; this.chat.sendPrompt(this.prompt, this.selectedAI.toLowerCase()).subscribe({ next: (res: any) => { if (res?.aviso) { this.aviso = res.aviso; } else if (res?.error) { this.aviso = res.error; } else { this.resposta = res.resposta; } this.loading = false; }, error: (err: any) => { console.error('Erro do POST /api/prompt', err); this.aviso = err.error?.aviso || err.error?.error || 'Ocorreu um erro ao processar sua solicitaÃ§Ã£o'; this.loading = false; } }); } }
